text.body:
saśailavanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena yathā jāgarti kuṇḍalī/
tathā sarvāṇi padmāni bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
praṇamya śūnyapadavīṃ
rājapathāyate/
cittaṃ nirālambaṃ kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhraṃmahāpathaṃ/
śmaśānaṃ śāmbhavī madhyemārgapratyekavācakam//
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena prabodhayatumīśvarī/
brahmadvāremukhe suptāṃ mudrābhyāsaṃ samācaret//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ mūla°bandhaś ca bandho jālandharābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyaṃ vajrolī śakticālanam/
idaṃ tu mudrādaśakaṃ jarāmaraṇanāśanam//
ādināthoditaṃ divyam aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva vaktavyaṃ kulastrīsurataṃ yathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoniḥ pīḍya dakṣiṇam/
pādaṃ prasāritaṃ kṛtvā karābhyāṃ pūrayen mukhe//
kaṇṭha bandhaḥ samāropya dhārayed vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
yathā daṇḍahataḥ sarpo daṇḍakāraḥ prajāyate//
rajvībhūtā yathā śakti kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
tadāsau maraṇāvasthā jāyate nṛpuṭāśritā//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayan na tu vegataḥ/
iyaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhiḥ prajāyate//
mahākleśā yathā doṣā jāyante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahāmudrā ca tenaiva vadanti vibudhottamāḥ//
candrāṃgaṃ tu samabhyasya sūryāṃgaṃ tu samabhyaset/
yāvat tulyā bhavesaṃkṣā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet//
na hi madhyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
ahimuktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam iva jīryate//
kṣayakuṣṭhamudāvartagulmājīrṇapurogamāḥ/
tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo’bhyaset//
kathitoyaṃ mahāmudrā mahāsiddhikarī nṛṇām/
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit//
pārṣṇi vāmasya pādasya yonisthāne yojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā tathā vāyuṃ hṛdaye svasanaṃ dṛḍham/
nivṛtya yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
cālayitvā yathāśaktyā recayed anilaṃ śanaiḥ//
savyāṅge ca samabhyasya dakṣāṅge ca sam°bhyaset//
matam atra tu keṣāṃcit kaṇṭhabandhaṃ visarjayet/
rājadantabalaṃ haṃti jihvayottambhayed iti//
ayaṃ khalu mahābandho mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābaddhovimocanavicakṣaṇaḥ//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnām ūrdhvaṃgatinibodhakaḥ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpaye naraṃ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpannā yathā strī puruṣaṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahābandho mahābaṃdhaṃ vinā tathā//
mahābandhasthito yogī kṛtvā pūrakaekadhā/
vāyunā gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrayā//
samahastayuge bhūmau dvijāt saṃtāḍayec chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya vāyu sphurati satvaraṃ/
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgnisaṃbandho jāyate cāmṛtāyate/
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato mṛtyubhayaṃ kutaḥ//
mahāvedho’yaabhyasto mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valīpalitavedhaghnaḥ sevyate sādhakottamaiḥ//
etat trayaṃ mahāguhyaṃ jarāmṛtyuvināśanam/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ caivam aṇimādigaṇapradam//
aṣṭadhā kriyate caiva yāme yāme dine dine/
puṇyasaṃbhārasambhāvi pāpaughabhiduraṃ sadā//
samyakśiṣyāvatāmevaṃ svalpaṃ prathamasādhane/
vahnistrīpathasevācanāmm ādau varjanam ādiśet//
vedanacālanadohaiḥ kalāṃ krameṇa vardhayet tāvat/
sā bhrūmadhyaṃ spṛśati tadānīṃ hi khecarīsiddhiḥ//
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī//
kalāṃ parāṅmukhīṃ kṛtvā tripathaṃ parivarjayet/
sā bhavet khecarī mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhati/
kṣaṇena mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na rogo maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā/
na ca mūrchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm//
cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
tenaiva khecarī mudrā sarva siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
tasya na kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calito’pi yadā binduḥ saṃprāptoyonimaṃgalaṃ/
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ haṭhāc chaktyānibaddho yonimudrayā//
indhanāni here.}
ūrdhvaṃjihvā sito bhūtvā somapānaṃ karoti yaḥ/
māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇa śarīraṃ yasya yoginaḥ/
takṣakeṇāpi daṃṣṭrasya viṣaṃ tasya na sarpati//
indhanāni yathā vahnitailavarti ca dīpakaḥ/
tathā sarvakalāpūrṇo dehī dehaṃ na muñcati//
gomāṃsaṃ bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇī/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ manye cetare kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluni/
gomāṃsaṃbhakṣaṇaṃ caitat mahāpātakanāśanam//
jihvāpraveśasaṃbhūtavahninotpāditaḥ khalu/
candrāt sravati yat sāraṃ sā syād amaravāruṇī//
mūrddhaṃ ṣoḍaśapatrapatragalitaṃ prāṇād avāptaṃ haṭhā-
d ūrdhvāsyo rasanā niyasya vivare śaktiṃ parāṃ cintayet/
utkallolakalājalaṃ ca vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣo ’sya mṛṇālakomalavapurr yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā rasasyandinī
sākṣārā kaṭutikta dugdhalavaṇā vaddhājyatulyātathā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jarāntakaraṇaṃ śāstrāgamoddhāraṇaṃ
tasya syād amaratvam aṣṭaguṇitaṃ siddhāṅganākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ dṛṣṭilayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā tu khecarī/
eko devo nirālambo ekāvasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam ucyate//
adhogatam apānaṃ vai ūrdhvagaṃ kurute haṭhāt/
ākuñcanena taṃ grāhyaṃ mūlabandhaṃ hi yoginaḥ//
gulpha pārṣṇyā ca saṃpīḍya vāyunākuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ yathā cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindu mūlabandhena caikatā/
gatvā yogasya saṃsiddhir gacchato nātra saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇayor aikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt//
apāne cordhvage jāte saṃprāpte vahnimaṇḍale/
tadānaleśikhā dīrghā vardhate vāyunāhatā//
tato vahnim apānai ca prāṇam uṣṇa svarūpakam/
tailābhyaṃtaḥpradīpāsau jvalano dehajas tathā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā satataṃ saṃprabodhyate/
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva niścitam ṛjutāṃ vrajet//
bilaṃ praviṣṭeva tato brahmanāḍyantaraṃ vrajet/
tasmānityo mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
bandho yena suṣumṇāyāṃ prāṇamuḍḍīyate yataḥ/
tasmāuḍḍīyāṇākhyo’yaṃ yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaṃ//
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ kṛte yasmād aviśrāntaṃ mahākhagaḥ/
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ taevaḥ syāt tatra bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udare paścime tāṇaṃ nābher ūrdhvaṃ tu kārayet/
uḍḍīyāṇo hy asau bandho mṛtyumātaṅgakesarī//
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ tu sahajaṃ guruṇā kathitaṃ sadā/
abhyaseasya taṃtrasya vṛddho’pi taruṇo bhavet//
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi tāṇaṃ kuryāt prayatnataḥ/
ṣaṇmāsaabhyasenn mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//
sati vajrāsane pādau karābhyāṃ dhārayed dṛḍham/
gulphadeśesamīpaṃ ca kandaṃ tatra prapīḍayet//
paścimaṃ tānaudaraṃ kārayevṛddhidaṃ śanaiḥ/
śanaiḥ śanair yathā prāṇaṃ tundasaṃdhi na gacchati//
sarveṣām eva bandhānām uuttamaṃ hy uḍḍīyāṇakaṃ/
uḍḍīyāṇe dṛḍhe bandhe muktiḥ svābhāvikī bhavet//
kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayedṛḍham icchayet/
bandho jālandharākhyo’yaṃ amṛtavyayakārakaḥ//
badhnāti hi śirojālam adhogāmi nabhojalam/
tato jālandharo bandhaḥ kaṇṭhaduḥkhaughanāśanaḥ//
jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭhasaṃkocalakṣaṇe/
na pīyūṣaṃ pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ pradhāvati//
kaṇṭhasaṃkocanenaiva dvau nāḍyau stambhitedhruvam/
madhyacakram idaṃ jñeyaṃ ṣoḍaśādhārabandhanam//
bandhatrayam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mahāsiddhair niṣevitam/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ yogino viduḥ//
mūlasthānaṃ samākṛṣya uḍḍīyāṇaṃ tu kārayet/
iḍā ca piṅgalā baddhā vāhayet paścimaṃ patham//
anenaiva vidhānena vaśayet pavanālayam/
tato na jāyate mṛtyu r jarārogādikaṃ tathā//
ūrdhvaṃ nābhir adhas tālur ūrdhvaṃ bhānur adhaḥ śaśī/
guruvākyena //
karaṇī viparītākṣaṃ sarvavyādhivināśanī/
nityam abhyāsayuktasya jaṭharāgnivivardhanī//
āhāro bahulas tasya saṃpādyaḥ sādhakasya tu/
anāhāro yadi bhaveagnidehaṃ dahet kṣaṇāt//
adhaḥśiraś cordhvapāda kṣaṇaṃ syāt prathame dine/
kṣaṇārdhaṃ kiṃcid adhikam abhyasec ca dine dine//
valitaṃ palitaṃ caiva ṣaṇmāsārdhe ca naśyati/
yāmamātraṃ tu yo nityam abhyaset sa ca kālavit//
svecchayā vartamāno’pi yogoktar niyamair vinā/
vajrolī yo vijānāti sa yogī siddhibhājanam//
tatra bhedadvayaṃ vakṣye durlabhaṃ yasya kasya cit/
kṣīraṃ caikaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu nārī ca vaśavartinī//
mehanena śanaiḥ samyag ūrdhvākuñcanam abhyaset/
puruṣo vāpi nārī vā vajrolīsiddhim āpnuyāt//
yatnataḥ śalanolena phūtkāraṃ vajrakandare/
śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prakurvīta vāyusaṃcārakāraṇāt//
nāryā bhage ca tadbindum abhyāsenordhvam āharet/
calitaṃ tu svakaṃ binduabhyāsenordhvam āharet//
evaṃ tu rakṣayed binduṃ mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit/
maraṇaṃ vidapātena jīvitaṃ bindudhāraṇāt//
sugandhor yogino deho jāyate bindudhāraṇāt/
yāvabindu sthiro dehe tāvakālabhayaṃ kutaḥ//
cittāyattaṃ nṛṇāṃ śukraṃ śukrāyattaṃ hi jīvitam/
tasmāc chukraṃ manaś caiva rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ//
ṛtumatyā ’py evaṃ bījaṃ binduṃ tu rakṣayet/
meḍhreṇākarṣayed ūrdhvaṃ samyagabhyāsayogavān//
sahajoliś cāmaroli vajrolyā eva bhedataḥ/
jaleṣu bhasma nikṣipya dagdhaṃgomayasambhavaṃ//
vajrolīmaithunād ūrdhvaṃ strīpuṃsoḥ svāṅgalepanam/
āsīnayoḥ sukhenaiva muktavyāpārayo kṣaṇam//
sahajolir iyaṃ proktā sevyate yogibhiḥ sadā/
ayaṃ śubhakaro yogo bhoga mukte’pi muktidaḥ//

vihāya niḥsmāratayāṃtyadhārām/
niṣevyate śītalamadhyadhārā
kāpālikaiḥ khaṃḍamitair amaryāḥ//
amarī yaḥ piben nityaṃ nasyaṃ kurvan dine dine/
vajrolī cābhyasec ceya amarolīti kathyate//

gaṅgāyamunayor madhye bālaraṇḍā tapaśvinī/
balātkāreṇa gṛhṇīyāt tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam//
pucchaṃ pragṛhya suptā/
nidrāṃ vihāya sā rajvī kurddhamākṛṣyate haṭhāt//
vajrāsanasthito yogī cālayitvā tu kuṇḍalīm/
sūryād anantaraṃ bhastri kuṇḍalīm āśu bodhayet//
bhānor ākuñcanaṃ kuryāt kuṇḍalīṃ cālayet tataḥ/
mṛtyuvaktragatasyāpi tasya mṛtyubhayaṃ kutaḥ//
muhūrtadvayaparyantaṃ nirbhayaṃś cālanād asau/
ūrdhvam ākṛṣyate kiṃcit suṣumnā kuṇḍalīgatā//
tena kuṇḍalinī tasyāḥ suṣumṇāyāḥ samuddhṛtā/
jahāti tasmāt prāṇo’yaṃ suṣumṇāṃ vrajati svanaḥ//
tasmāt saṃcālayen nityaṃ śambhugarbhām arundhatīm/
yasyāḥ saṃcālayenāśu yogī rogaiḥ vimucyate//
yena saṃcalitā śaktiḥ sa yogī siddhibhājanam/
kim atra bahunoktena kālaṃ jayati līlayā//
abhyāsanibhṛtāṃ cāndrīṃ vibhūtyā saha miśrayet/
taddhāraṇaṃ tūttamāṅge divyadṛṣṭipradāyakam//
iti mudrā daśa proktā ādināthena śambhunā/
ekaikatāsu yamināṃ mahāsiddhipradāyinī//
rājayogaṃ vinā vṛddhir rājayogaṃ vinā niśā/
rājayogaṃ vinā mudrā vicitrāpi na rājate//
mārutasya vidhiṃ sarvaṃ manoyuktaṃ samabhyaset/
itaratra na kartavyā manovṛttimanīṣiṇām//
calāpi madhyamā nāḍī dṛḍhābhyāsena yoginām/
āsanaṃprāṇasaṃyāmamudrābhiḥ śavalā bhavet//
